name: Bobs Office Adventure
description:
Bob needs to deliver a letter to his boss. Unfortunately for Bob, his boss is not the most jolly person in the world. Of course Bob is afraid of his boss and he doesn’t want to go one step into his office! To fix this Bob thought of a genius plan. He gives the letter to one of his colleagues, who then give the letter to his boss, problem solved! But what Bob didn’t realize, is that his colleagues are distracted very easily. Now it’s Bobs task to make sure his colleagues do not mess up and deliver the letter for the boss.

Arrow Keys to Move and 'e' to interact

Music: Bensounds.com

Art by Lauwe T:

https://www.instagram.com/lauwe.t/

https://laubast.tumblr.com/

Programming and Unity work by Harmey & giquon.
